manga.title: One Piece
manga.description: A story about a young pirate, Monkey D. Luffy, as he searches for the ultimate treasure, One Piece.

manga.title: Naruto
manga.description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and the leader of his village.

manga.title: Attack on Titan
manga.description: Humanity fights for survival against gigantic humanoid creatures known as Titans.

manga.title: My Hero Academia
manga.description: In a world where nearly everyone has superpowers, a boy without powers enrolls in a hero academy.

manga.title: Demon Slayer
manga.description: Tanjiro Kamado, a kind-hearted boy, becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

manga.title: Tokyo Ghoul
manga.description: Kaneki Ken, a college student, becomes a half-ghoul after a fateful encounter and struggles with his new identity.

manga.title: Fullmetal Alchemist
manga.description: Two brothers use alchemy to try to restore their bodies after a failed alchemy experiment.

manga.title: Death Note
manga.description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name.

manga.title: Dragon Ball
manga.description: The adventures of Goku, who seeks the Dragon Balls to summon a wish-granting dragon.

manga.title: Bleach
manga.description: Ichigo Kurosaki, a high school student, becomes a Soul Reaper to protect the living from evil spirits.

manga.title: Test sweatallert
manga.description: Test sweatallertTest sweatallertTest sweatallertTest sweatallertTest sweatallertTest sweatallert

genres.title: Action
genres.description: Action manga are known for dynamic fight scenes, epic battles, and fast-paced storylines. This genre often involves strong characters engaging in intense physical conflicts.

genres.title: Adventure
genres.description: Adventure manga often focus on characters embarking on journeys filled with challenges, exploration of new worlds, and encounters with various obstacles.

genres.title: Comedy
genres.description: Comedy manga bring lighthearted entertainment, using humor to make readers laugh through funny situations, witty dialogues, and quirky characters.

genres.title: Fantasy
genres.description: Fantasy manga take place in imaginative worlds filled with magic, mythical creatures, and supernatural elements. These stories often revolve around quests and battles against dark forces.

genres.title: Shonen
genres.description: Shonen manga are typically aimed at young male audiences, focusing on action, friendship, rivalry, and growth through hard work and perseverance.

genres.title: Martial Arts
genres.description: Martial arts manga feature characters mastering various combat techniques, often set in tournaments or focused on achieving personal strength and skill.

genres.title: Drama
genres.description: Drama manga emphasize emotional and psychological development, often involving complex relationships and intense, sometimes tragic, events.

genres.title: Superpower
genres.description: Superpower manga involve characters with extraordinary abilities, often set in worlds where individuals possess unique powers that set them apart from ordinary humans.

genres.title: Horror
genres.description: Horror manga are designed to elicit fear and unease, often involving supernatural creatures, disturbing imagery, and psychological terror.

genres.title: Psychological
genres.description: Psychological manga delve into the human mind, exploring themes of mental conflict, moral ambiguity, and the darker sides of human nature.

genres.title: Sci-Fi
genres.description: Sci-Fi manga incorporate futuristic technology, space exploration, and advanced scientific concepts, often questioning the impact of such developments on humanity.

genres.title: Thriller
genres.description: Thriller manga keep readers on the edge of their seats with suspenseful storylines, often involving mysteries, chases, and intense moments of tension.

genres.title: Fighting
genres.description: Fighting manga are heavily focused on hand-to-hand combat, duels, and battles, often set in competitions or rivalries between skilled fighters.

genres.title: Supernatural
genres.description: Supernatural manga involve elements that defy the laws of nature, such as ghosts, spirits, and other paranormal phenomena.

authors.name: Eiichiro
authors.description: The creator of One Piece, known for his detailed world-building and unique art style.

authors.name: Masashi
authors.description: The author of Naruto, famous for his influential work in the shonen genre.

authors.name: Hajime
authors.description: The mind behind Attack on Titan, known for his intense storytelling and dark themes.

authors.name: Kohei
authors.description: The creator of My Hero Academia, recognized for his dynamic action scenes and diverse character designs.

authors.name: Koyoharu
authors.description: The author of Demon Slayer, noted for their emotional storytelling and beautiful art.

authors.name: Sui
authors.description: The creator of Tokyo Ghoul, known for their unique take on horror and psychological themes.

authors.name: Hiromu
authors.description: The author of Fullmetal Alchemist, famous for intricate plotlines and strong character development.

authors.name: Tsugumi
authors.description: Co-author of Death Note, known for creating gripping psychological thrillers.

authors.name: Akira
authors.description: The legendary creator of Dragon Ball, renowned for his impact on manga and anime.

authors.name: Tite
authors.description: The author of Bleach, celebrated for his stylish character designs and action-packed storylines.
